import React from "react"; import "./ContactMe.css"; import Aos from "aos"; import "aos/dist/aos.css"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import Email from "./Email" const ContactMe = () => { useEffect(() => { Aos.init({ duration: 2000 }); }, []); return ( <>

Contact

Location:

Kanpur, Uttar Pradesh

Email:

abhishekyadav17012000@gmail.com

Call:

+91-6386653849

linkedin:

Abhishek Yadav

); }; export default ContactMe;
